description: When one create a volume with volume type 'standard', the EC2 API doesn't reflect this. The API response still shows volume.type as None.
title: EC2 API doesn't return Cinder volume 'type'

comments.content: When one create a volume with volume type 'standard', the EC2 API doesn't reflect this. The API response still shows volume.type as None.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rushiagr
